p: Utilizing the derived core analytic expressions, we analyze and interpret the data evidence to compare and contrast the operational efficiencies in all the four zones with respect to social distancing, adapting hospitalizations, offering optimal treatment for recovery, and the pattern of inevitable mortality due to either the ugly virality of the coronavirus and/or individualâ€™s lack of strong immunity to resist. We believe that the approach and research findings (not thorough or complete in any sense) for the US regions will form a basis to come forward with a viable, consistent, robust future healthcare delivery of services, drugs, and facilities.
